block_comment: This block leverages a D-flip flop to sample and hold the value of "dqs_even[12]" at the rising edge of the clock. The function "dqs_even_receiver" is called with "12" as the input, each time there is a positive edge on the "dqs_even[12]". Implementation-wise, this action is noted with the "always @ (posedge dqs_even[12])", which signifies that the said function call is triggered by the positive edge of "dqs_even[12]".
